contents.text: Welcome to Kong, your partner in secure, managed, and orchestrated microservice APIs based in San Francisco.
To inquire about new licenses and pricing plans, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you to a sales representative.

navigationGoals: I need detailed pricing and licensing options for adding new API gateway instances.
Inquire about pricing options and veteran discounts for purchasing new API gateway licenses.
Get enterprise license tier pricing for deploying Kong Gateway in production clusters.
Could you please explain the pricing for a new API license? I’m not very tech-savvy and would appreciate some guidance.
I’d like information on academic licensing and student pricing for Kong’s API platform

contents.text: For assistance with your existing account or subscription, press 2.
Please hold while we connect you to account support.

navigationGoals: I need to update the billing and payment information on my current subscription.
Update my payment method and renewal settings on my current subscription.
Update my existing subscription’s billing info and review API call usage quotas.
I need help managing my current subscription and checking my renewal options.
I need to update my current subscription and review my invoice details

contents.text: For technical support and API management, press 2.
To report an API issue or get troubleshooting help, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you to technical support.

navigationGoals: I’m experiencing a 500 error on one of my API endpoints and need help troubleshooting it.
Report a 500 Internal Server Error in my API deployment and request troubleshooting support.
Troubleshoot intermittent 502 Bad Gateway errors on my Kong-managed microservice endpoints.
My API isn’t working and keeps giving errors—I’d like help troubleshooting it.
I’m encountering a 401 Unauthorized error in my API requests and need troubleshooting assistance

contents.text: For API onboarding and developer resources, press 2.
Please hold while we connect you to our developer success team.

navigationGoals: I want to onboard a new developer and get access to integration guides and resources.
Obtain developer onboarding materials and best practices for integrating plugins.
Access the developer portal for onboarding docs and Go SDK examples for Kong’s API.
I’m new to this and need assistance setting up the API and finding the right developer guides.
Could you provide onboarding documentation and best practices for integrating my service with Kong?
